text: Howard Arthur Allen (born February 10, 1949) is an American serial killer from Indianapolis, Indiana. He murdered three elderly people and also committed assault, burglary, and arson. On June 11, 1988, he was sentenced to death by lethal injection for the murder of Ernestine Griffin. On August 30, 1988, he was placed on death row where he spent the next 25 years awaiting a ruling by a U.S. district court on a petition for a writ of habeas corpus. On appeal, Allen was resentenced to 60 years' imprisonment for the murder on the grounds of mental retardation. The Indiana Department of Correction lists his release date as April 23, 2035. he is currently imprisoned in the Wabash Valley Correctional Facility.https://www.in.gov/apps/indcorrection/ofs/ofs ==See also== * List of death row inmates in the United States * List of serial killers in the United States ==References== ==External links== *Indiana Department of Corrections Website / Offender Search DOC Number: 881978 Category:1949 births Category:American serial killers Category:Male serial killers Category:People from Indianapolis Category:Living people Category:American prisoners sentenced to death Category:Prisoners sentenced to death by Indiana Category:People convicted of murder by Indiana Category:20th- century American criminals Category:American male criminals
